thread.title: Ntsiki is crushing hard on the People's Bae no.2
thread.title_full: Ntsiki is crushing hard on the People's Bae no.2 - Times LIVE

author: TshisaLIVE
title: Ntsiki is crushing hard on the People's Bae no.2
text:
Ntsiki is crushing hard on the People's Bae no.2 TshisaLIVE | 23 February, 2017 11:35 Ntsiki Mazwai thinks People's Bae no.2 is "too fine".
Image by: Twitter/Nandie Ntloko Guess who else can't get over UDM's Nqabayomzi Kwankwa aka People's Bae no.2? Ntsiki Mazwai! Move over, Ndlozi: New people's bae spotted at #SONA2017 SLAY! Khanyi Mbau goes nude for Previdar cover Guaped! Somizi travels with a cooler box filled with expensive champers Cassper to perform at Israeli Apartheid Week concert Ntsiki did not hold back when she tweeted about how "fine" the second People's Bae, (second to the original People's Bae Mbuyiseni Ndlozi) looked.
Nipples and thigh: 4 sizzling pictures from Khanyi Mbau's Previdar shoot She gushed over Kwankwa, saying she would not mind being one of his many wives. She even admitted that she tried to look the other way, but Kwankwa was just too fine.
Yerrr kwankwa gard daym
— Imbongikazi yeSizwe (@ntsikimazwai) February 22, 2017 Oh my oath....i dont mind being his tenth baby mama i tries to hate...i cant to this...he is f
— Imbongikazi yeSizwe (@ntsikimazwai) February 22, 2017 MP Nqabayomzi Kwankwa recently became an internet sensation and his fan base grows on the regular. So what do you think? Are you with Ntsiki on this one? Cassper to perform at Israeli Apartheid Week concert Here's a reminder of People's Bae 1 vs 2...
